properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_WRITER = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , SALE_NO , REPORT_WRITER , REPORT_CATEGORY , REPORT_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_STATUS FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_WRITER = ? ORDER BY REPORT_ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , SALE_NO , REPORT_WRITER , REPORT_CATEGORY , REPORT_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_STATUS FROM REPORT WHERE REPORT_WRITER = ? ORDER BY REPORT_ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM = ?
